title: The Neural Network
premise: In 2035, a neuroscientist discovers that human consciousness can be digitally transferred, but the technology falls into the wrong hands, threatening the nature of human identity itself.

main_character.name: Dr. Maya Patel
main_character.background: Computational neuroscientist at Stanford, former DARPA researcher
main_character.motivation: Protect her revolutionary consciousness transfer technology from corporate exploitation

supporting_characters.name: Alex Chen
supporting_characters.background: Ethical hacker and Maya's former student
supporting_characters.motivation: Help Maya expose the corporate conspiracy

supporting_characters.name: Victoria Sterling
supporting_characters.background: CEO of Nexus Technologies, ruthless tech mogul
supporting_characters.motivation: Commercialize consciousness transfer for profit and control

market_requirements.competitive_positioning: unique take on consciousness transfer trope
